title: Maid of Honour
description: Lady Mary Seton, maid of honour to the ill-starred Mary Queen of Scots, followed her queen through the tragic years of her tempestuous life. Her story moves to France, to the corrupt and elegant court of Henry II, then back to Scotland with her widowed mistress to a world of danger and intrigue. Passionate and pious, timid and courageous, in command of the love of two men how could she condemn her queen for adultery when she herself had fallen in love with a priest?
author: Elizabeth Byrd
